title: Ticket #4296: condor_q man page needs minor improvement
description:
The condor_q man page needs better specification, especially the -autoformat option. Here is an extra example from bt to enable the improvement: 

condor_q -constraint jobstatus==2 -af RemoteHost

Nowhere does it tell you when you use condor_q that HOST is the field RemoteHost.
I wanted just the locations where jobs were running. TJ says condor_q is messed up
so I had to not use -run -af RemoteHost which gives a good first field, the RemoteHost
and then a bunch of crap.

The first gave this: condor_q -run -af RemoteHost

slot1@ingwe.cs.wisc.edu    2.0   [????????????] [?????????? [??????????] [????????????????]
slot2@ingwe.cs.wisc.edu    2.1   [????????????] [?????????? [??????????] [????????????????]
slot3@ingwe.cs.wisc.edu    2.2   [????????????] [?????????? [??????????] [????????????????]
slot4@ingwe.cs.wisc.edu    2.3   [????????????] [?????????? [??????????] [????????????????]

The second gave this: condor_q -constraint jobstatsus==2 -af RemoteHost

slot1@ingwe.cs.wisc.edu
slot2@ingwe.cs.wisc.edu
slot3@ingwe.cs.wisc.edu
slot4@ingwe.cs.wisc.edu
check_ins: 2015-Mar-02 16:17   Check-in [43491]: improve description of condor_q -autoformat option #4296 (By Karen Miller )
creator: smoler
